betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Electric Boots of the Traveller grant you a 2% Vis Discount along with all the benefits of the regular Boots of the Traveller.

In addition, they come with a wide variety of new features thanks to our amazing magic devs:

- Configurable Jump Boost: You can choose between 0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, or a 100% jump boost.

- Configurable Speed Boost: Similar to the jump boost, you can adjust the speed boost percentage to your preference.

- Flight Inertia: When toggled on, this feature cancels inertia while flying, allowing for precise movement even when traveling at high speeds.

- Omnidirectional Movement: This toggle lets you decide whether your speed boost applies in all directions or only while running straight ahead.

[note]None of these keybinds are set by default. The easiest way to configure them is to go into Options -> Controls, turn on the "Category" button, and type "Thaumic Boots." Then, assign keys for the features as needed.[/note]

[note]If you want to advance in the dark arts you can also make them voidwalker boots.[/note]
betterquesting:10.name:8: Better Boots with a little pizzazz
